directions: In a small saucepan simmer water with sugar, rum, and zest 5 minutes. add kiwi and simmer 2 minutes. Cut banana into 1/4-inch slices and simmer in syrup 30 seconds. Transfer fruit with a slotted spoon to a bowl. Boil syrup until reduced to about 1/2 cup and stir in fruit.
Serve fruit and syrup over ice cream.
ingredients: 1 kiwi, peeled, quartered lengthwise, and cut into 1/4-inch-thick pieces
title: Vanilla Ice Cream with Kiwi and Banana in Lime Rum Syrup
